title: Trading Bot
description: Full-stack trading bot with real-time data processing and order management system built during summer break.

details.overview: Built a trading system from scratch, focusing on robust architecture for easy interpretability of strategies employed.
architecture: Centralised Real-time Data from IBKR API
Centralised Order Management System across strategies for limit/market orders
PostgreSQL for trade history and analytics
results: Currently Paper Trading 3 different trading strategies

API design patterns for AI services
